regen.new_specification: The system shall initiate a predefined security response if any verification of 'Message Digest' values fails to match the recorded development values.

regen.absent_element: monitoring or alerting for security breaches during data processing and verification
regen.new_specification: The system shall monitor and alert the operator in case any security breaches are detected during data processing or verification activities.
The system shall alert the operator and initiate a corrective process if the 'Message Digest' verification fails for any control unit.

label: A verification failure shall will cause an alarm condition for the affected control unit.
absence: action of alarm for a verification failure
